name: Enter Space
description:
Face off against endless waves of enemies, encountering different types as you advance!

Earn your salvage/money and use it to upgrade your ship, weapons, and thrusters.

Beat your high score as you get better at dodging and weaving through enemy bullets.

Includes:
  • Local high scores
  • Endless waves of enemies
  • Ship upgrades
  • And a lot of bullets

This is a small personal project I have been working on for a little over 2 months.

If you encounter any bugs or repeatable crashes, please start a discussion about it,  tell me how to recreate it, and write in detail what happens.

Thank you for your support!
